languages.text: "Вижу, вы не пытаетесь бежать и даете бой врагу. Похвально".
"I see you are not trying to flee and have chosen to fight instead. I commend your resolve."
languages.original_text: "Вижу, вы не пытаетесь бежать и даете бой врагу. Похвально".

traits.locale_text: "I see you are not trying to escape and have chosen to fight instead. I commend your resolve."
"I see you are not trying to escape and have chosen to fight instead. I commend your resolve."
"I see you are not trying to flee and have chosen to fight instead. I commend your resolve."
"I see you are not trying to flee and have chosen to fight instead. I commend your resolve."
"I see you are not trying to flee and have chosen to fight instead. I commend your resolve."
"I see you are not trying to flee and have chosen to fight instead. I commend your resolve."

languages.text: "Wie ich sehe, versucht Ihr nicht zu fliehen, sondern wollt kämpfen. Hut ab vor Eurer Entschlossenheit."
languages.original_text: "I see you are not trying to flee and have chosen to fight instead. I commend your resolve."

traits.locale_text: "Wie ich sehe, versucht Ihr nicht zu fliehen, sondern wollt kämpfen. Hut ab vor Eurer Entschlossenheit."

languages.text: « Je vois que vous ne cherchez pas à fuir et que vous avez plutôt choisi de vous battre. Je vous félicite pour votre détermination. »
languages.original_text: "I see you are not trying to flee and have chosen to fight instead. I commend your resolve."

traits.locale_text: « Je vois que vous ne cherchez pas à fuir et que vous avez plutôt choisi de vous battre. Je vous félicite pour votre détermination. »

languages.text: «Veo que ha decidido presentar batalla en vez de huir. Su determinación es digna de elogio».
languages.original_text: "I see you are not trying to flee and have chosen to fight instead. I commend your resolve."

traits.locale_text: «Veo que ha decidido presentar batalla en vez de huir. Su determinación es digna de elogio».

languages.text: “看得出来，你并没打算逃跑，而是选择了战斗。我很欣赏你的决心。”
languages.original_text: "I see you are not trying to flee and have chosen to fight instead. I commend your resolve."

traits.locale_text: “看得出来，你并没打算逃跑，而是选择了战斗。我很欣赏你的决心。”

languages.text: 「逃げずに戦うことを選んだようだな。君の覚悟を称えよう」
languages.original_text: "I see you are not trying to flee and have chosen to fight instead. I commend your resolve."

traits.locale_text: 「逃げずに戦うことを選んだようだな。君の覚悟を称えよう」

languages.text: "Gördüğüm kadarıyla kaçmaya çalışmak yerine savaşmayı seçmişsiniz. Azminizi takdir ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I see you are not trying to flee and have chosen to fight instead. I commend your resolve."

traits.locale_text: "Gördüğüm kadarıyla kaçmaya çalışmak yerine savaşmayı seçmişsiniz. Azminizi takdir ediyorum."
